info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:55PM EDT until July 30 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR DEKALB COUNTY... At 1155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Panthersville, or near Decatur, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Belvedere Park, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Redan, Scottdale, Kirkwood, Panthersville, East Lake, Gresham Park, and Snapfinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
